thread.title: Netflix might have taken down your favourite series
thread.title_full: Netflix might have taken down your favourite series

title: Netflix might have taken down your favourite series
text:
Netflix might have taken down your favourite series Netflix might have taken down your favourite series Share 
Netflix UK removed some much-loved series overnight – and it’s got people really mad. 
Binge-watchers took to Twitter to mourn the unexpected loss of their favourite programmes, after The Office US, The IT Crowd and Fresh Meat vanished into thin air. 
BBC Radio 1 presenter Greg James led the chorus of disappointed cries, as fans complained of being cut off mid-series. Excuse me, @NetflixUK …where the heck has the @theofficenbc gone???! pic.twitter.com/Fgonvyhukd 
— Greg James (@gregjames) October 1, 2015 
And he was not alone. Oh my GOD!!! The Office has just gone. Not warning or nothing! How can you do this to me @NetflixUK ??? 
— Jurassic Perks (@LongLivePerkins) October 1, 2015 I'm honestly distraught that @NetflixUK has removed the U.S. Office. I've got no idea what to do now. 
— Nik Utne (@nikutne) October 1, 2015 No one knows how upset and traumatised I was when @NetflixUK decided to take off the office US, it's my favourite show 😭😭😭😭 #Netflix #office 
— Dan⚡️ (@DanEdwards94) October 1, 2015 
This girl just doesn’t know who to trust any more. too scared to start watching anything on @NetflixUK in case it gets taken away from me again. first scrubs and now the office 💔💔💔 
— Emma Knowlton (@Emma_Knowlton) October 1, 2015 
It wasn’t just The Office US fans who were distraught. Netflix have taken Fresh Meat off!! Why!!??? I hadn't even finished the series 😭😭 @NetflixUK
